summary: SummaryArdell's Naked Lashes have subtle volume & length for everyday wear. Naked Lash #420 - 4 Pack has shortened length and crisscross layering.
details: DetailsBenefitsBarely-there lash styles enhance eyes subtly and naturallyFeaturesLightweight lash volume creates subtle definitionInvisiband lash band provides the most comfortable wear and allows for a seamless, truly undetectable lookPerfect for first time false lash users as an introduction to strip lashesSuitable for avid false lash wearers with shorter, sparser natural lashes or with a preference for lighter, natural stylesIncludesFour pairs of Naked Lash 420Item 2576731How To UseCheck fit: Align band with natural lash line to check fit. Trim excess if necessary.Apply adhesive: Apply a thin line of adhesive along the band. Wait 30 seconds to set.Apply Lashes: Secure lash band by pressing onto lash line.Precautions: Use only as directed. Keep out of reach of children. For external use only.
how_to_use: Check fit: Align band with natural lash line to check fit. Trim excess if necessary.Apply adhesive: Apply a thin line of adhesive along the band. Wait 30 seconds to set.Apply Lashes: Secure lash band by pressing onto lash line.Precautions: Use only as directed. Keep out of reach of children. For external use only.

reviews.headline: Stunning, adds volume without being gaudy
reviews.comments: People can't tell I'm wearing fake eyelashes, but they do notice they look amazing. If you want fuller lashes without anything overboard, these are perfect for you.

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: These lashes are super good. The flexible lash line is very helpful. It's super easy to apply lash glue onto and very easy to apply. They also have a very natural look, so i look effortlessly beautiful.

reviews.headline: Buyer beware, glue not intended
reviews.comments: I returned the item. It is not clear from the packaging that glue is NOT included.

reviews.headline: fav lashes
reviews.comments: my favorite lashes i love them but theyre super delicate

reviews.headline: Great lashes for price point
reviews.comments: These are my go-to lashes now. You do have to be careful, as with all lashes, when remiving them off the tray. Grab from outer corner with tweezers and gently remove. I get so many compliments, poeple dont even know im wearing falsies because the band is so thin. If I'm careful, I can get two weeks use out of each pair.

reviews.headline: Ardell Naked False Lashes #420 Multipack
reviews.comments: These lashes were just right for me. They were so natural. No one knew I had lashes on, they just thought I was wearing mascara. I will buy them again.

reviews.headline: Have used Ardell lashes for years.  They are the best.
reviews.comments: Ardell lashes have many styles and always look natural.

reviews.headline: Looks great!
reviews.comments: I've seen these all over tiktok and wanted to give them a try. One person reccomended cutting them in half, and I LOVE how it looks cut in half. I plan on using these for my wedding next year. Especially since I cut them in half, they're so comfy. One plus is, I used only one lash because of cutting them! I highly reccomend

reviews.headline: LOVE IT
reviews.comments: One of my favorite lashes when i want lashes but not so dramatic  that still looks natural ! Best Ever

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: These go on easy but was not a fan of the look of the lashes. I wanted a more natural look.

reviews.headline: Must have
reviews.comments: My go-to lash especially as a glasses wearer! These are beautiful and look natural. It basically gives a "my lash but better"look.

reviews.headline: Perfect Natural Lashes
reviews.comments: These are the perfect natural looking lashes. Super lightweight and very comfortable. I love them so much that I even bought them for my daughters and now they love them too. Very user-friendly.

reviews.headline: I would purchase again
reviews.comments: I love these. Very natural looking and easy to apply.

reviews.headline: very natural very lightweight
reviews.comments: I'm not a big lash user. these lashes are very very natural. they add volume to my natural lashes but are pretty similar in length as my natural lashes. they are very lightweight. for me both those things are a a plus for me as I'm not very used to using lashes some can feel very heavy and I'm aware I'm wearing lashes all day these I really do forget I have them on.

reviews.headline: Beautiful half lashes
reviews.comments: If you chop them in half and use them as half lashes they are BEAUTIFULLLL. I always get lots of compliments for people ask if i had extensions.

reviews.headline: Great lashes
reviews.comments: These lashes are great and very natural. I just have to purchase them online because they are not all made equally. Some look thick, especially around the band. I hope all these reviews help with them improving these lashes with consistency.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Very easy to apply….subtle change. I love them!

reviews.headline: Lashes look super natural
reviews.comments: I love these lashes. They make my eyes look super natural. My pwn lashes are pretty long so these blend in makes them look fuller. Many people were shocked to learn they were falsies

reviews.headline: Not the same lashes, bad Ulta experience
reviews.comments: There's been some sort of change up in the manufacturing of these lashes. I've purchased the 420's many times, what I received was was thicker and unnatural looking compared to the thinner wispy originals. I exchanged them at ulta and pointed out the difference to the cashier, who could have cared less. I'm probably the most upset because they did not honor my coupon I originally bought the lashes with, because of their mistake. Wow ulta, just wow.

reviews.headline: Ugh, they've changed
reviews.comments: Like many others reviewers say, these lashes used to be amazing. The last two times I have ordered them the lashes are completely different. The band is thick and difficult to manage, the lashes are grouped together differently and overall there are more lashes on the band. They feel much cheaper and are difficult to work with versus the old 420s that were fabulous.

media.headline: They changed the lashes
media.caption: Old ones on the left and new ones on the right

media.headline: Literally the only lashes I use on my brides now!
media.caption: half lashes, outer corners

media.headline: Literally the only lashes I use on my brides now!

faceoff_positive.comments:
These are GREAT for clients who want lashes but are a little hesitant about an overly glammed look. These are my go-to natural lashes! If someone wants a more dramatic look I will use the 421s. My favorite for myself is to cut these in half and put them on the outer corners (see pic) 

*my only complaint is that there has been a couple of "bad batches" that have gone out where the band is very thick and lifts. Do not buy those ones!
faceoff_positive.headline: Literally the only lashes I use on my brides now!

faceoff_negative.comments: I had been using this for months on many bridal clients. I would buy these in BULK because it looked so good on so many people. I then got some new ones and they're not the same. I have a photo for comparison of the old ones versus the new ones. The old ones, the bands were super thin and easy to work with. The lashes were softer and fluffier.
faceoff_negative.headline: They changed the lashes
